堂.definition: (main) hall; large room for a specific purpose; CL:間|间[jian1]; relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family; of the same clan; classifier for classes, lectures etc; classifier for sets of furniture

堂兄弟.definition: father's brother's sons; paternal male cousin

堂堂正正.definition: displaying strength and discipline; impressive; upright and frank; square

堂妹夫.definition: husband of younger female cousin via male line

堂姊妹.definition: father's brother's daughters; paternal female cousin

堂姐夫.definition: husband of older female cousin via male line

堂嫂.definition: wife of older male cousin via male line

堂屋.definition: central room of a traditional Chinese house

堂弟妹.definition: wife of younger male cousin via male line; younger cousins via male line

堂弟媳.definition: wife of younger male cousin via male line

堂房.definition: remote relatives (with the same family name)

堂而皇之.definition: overt; to make no secret (of one's presence); grandiose; with great scope

堂食.definition: to eat in (at the restaurant) (contrasted with 外帶|外带[wai4dai4]); (restaurant) dine-in service
